Description.Name: WIZNET Azure Sphere Guardian EVB V1.0
MainCoreHeaderFileTopContent: /* Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
// This header contains the peripheral pinout definitions for the
// WIZNET Azure Sphere Guardian EVB V1.0

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_STATUS_LD1
Peripherals.Comment: AZURE Connection status LED uses GPIO58.

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_STATUS_LD2
Peripherals.Comment: WiFi Connection status LED uses GPIO46 and ADC5.

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_STATUS_LD3
Peripherals.Comment: WLAN Connection status LED uses GPIO60.

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_STATUS_LD4
Peripherals.Comment: BLE Connection status LED uses GPIO45 and ADC4.

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_ISU1_UART
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 1 configured as UART, pin 40 (RX), pin 42 (TX), pin 39 (CTS) and pin 41 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_ISU1_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 1 configured as SPI, pin 40 (MISO), pin 42 (SCLK), pin 39 (CSA) and pin 41 (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_ISU1_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 1 configured as I2C,  pin 40 (SDA) and pin 41 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_ISU2_UART
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 2 configured as UART, pin 35 (RX), pin 37 (TX), pin 34 (CTS) and pin 36 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_ISU2_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 2 configured as SPI, pin 35 (MISO), pin 37 (SCLK), pin 34 (CSA) and pin 36 (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_ISU2_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 2 configured as I2C,  pin 35 (SDA) and pin 36 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_ISU3_UART
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 3 configured as UART, pin 89 (RX), pin 91 (TX), pin 87 (CTS) and pin 90 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_ISU3_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 3 configured as SPI, pin 89 (MISO), pin 91 (SCLK), pin 87 (CSA) and pin 90 (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_ISU3_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 3 configured as I2C,  pin 89 (SDA) and pin 90 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_ISU3_EXT_SEL
Peripherals.Comment: Select ISU3 external header and also can configured as UART, SPI and I2C.

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_MB1_UART
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 1 configured as UART, pin 40 (RX), pin 42 (TX), pin 39 (CTS) and pin 41 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_MB1_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 1 configured as SPI, pin 40 (MISO), pin 42 (SCLK), pin 39 (CSA) and pin 41 (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_MB1_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 3 configured as I2C,  pin 89 (SDA) and pin 90 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_MB2_UART
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 2 configured as UART, pin 35 (RX), pin 37 (TX), pin 34 (CTS) and pin 36 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_MB2_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 2 configured as SPI, pin 35 (MISO), pin 37 (SCLK), pin 34 (CSA) and pin 36 (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_MB2_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 3 configured as I2C,  pin 89 (SDA) and pin 90 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_GROVE_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 3 configured as I2C,  pin 89 (SDA) and pin 90 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_GROVE_UART
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 3 configured as UART, pin 89 (RX), pin 91 (TX), pin 87 (CTS) and pin 90 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_J6_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 3 configured as I2C,  pin 89 (SDA) and pin 90 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_J6_UART
Peripherals.Comment: ISU 3 configured as UART, pin 89 (RX), pin 91 (TX), pin 87 (CTS) and pin 90 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_J6_EXT_SEL
Peripherals.Comment: Select ISU3 external header and also can configured as UART, SPI and I2C.

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_W5500_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: W5500 ISU 0 configured as SPI, pin 45 (MISO), pin 48 (SCLK), pin 44 (CSA) and pin 46 (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: WIZNET_ASG_EVB_W5500_SPI_CS
Peripherals.Comment: SD SPI Chip Select (CS) value "A". This is not a peripheral identifier, and so has no meaning in an app manifest.
